code:
import axios from'axios';import store from'../redux/store';import{LOGOUT}from'../redux/actions/types';var api=axios.create({baseURL:'/api',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});/**
 Intercept any error responses from the api
 and check if the token is no longer valid.
 i.e. Token has expired,
 logout the user if the token has expired.
**/api.interceptors.response.use(function(res){return res;},function(err){if(err.response.data.msg==='Token is not valid'){store.dispatch({type:LOGOUT});}return Promise.reject(err);});export default api;
